about_the_game:
Wish Upon A Llama is a cozy, animal-focused RPG for pet lovers! As Llama Town's dedicated rancher, it is your responsibility to provide whole-hearted love and care for your beloved friends.



  • Take your animals on walks anywhere you go to explore and enjoy the countryside together!
  • Animals come in various colours, patterns, and personalities. Baby animals will inherit genetic traits from both parents, so you'll need to consider these factors as you breed your animals. Can you discover all 50+ special breeds?
  • Give gifts to your animals, pet, interact with them and play fetch together!
  • Find and befriend wild animals in various unique areas such as a procedurally-generated maze-like forest!



  • Cultivate strong connections with your companions through mini-games like fetch, and by showering them with pets, snacks, and toys!
  • Optionally assist animals in finding their ideal home by facilitating an adoption matching process with the townsfolk. You'll still be able to see them around town and check on their well-being
  • Animals will display family bonds and distinct individual personalities. As players invest more quality time caring for their furry friends, they'll gain abilities to enhance their understanding of them, fostering deeper connections and interactions





Llama Town boasts a diverse population for you to meet! From the aspiring designer to the chill gamer, resilient immigrant, and determined engineer, encounter individuals with unique personalities and intriguing stories. Forge new friendships and perhaps discover romance. Challenge your friends to activities like jump rope, town cleaning, trivia games, spelling bees, and more -- there's never a dull moment in Llama Town!

Meet our dateable characters:

Other features 🥰


  • Start your own family and guide your children as they grow, go to school, and make their own friends, with the loving support of nearby grandparents
  • By fueling the town's fundraising efforts, witness the unveiling of new infrastructure and breathtaking locales -- think vacation islands, lush forests, bustling cities, and picturesque beaches!
  • Unleash your creativity and personalize your dwelling and surrounding land. Fill them with decor to make your one-of-a-kind dream home
detailed_description:
Wish Upon A Llama is a cozy, animal-focused RPG for pet lovers! As Llama Town's dedicated rancher, it is your responsibility to provide whole-hearted love and care for your beloved friends.



  • Take your animals on walks anywhere you go to explore and enjoy the countryside together!
  • Animals come in various colours, patterns, and personalities. Baby animals will inherit genetic traits from both parents, so you'll need to consider these factors as you breed your animals. Can you discover all 50+ special breeds?
  • Give gifts to your animals, pet, interact with them and play fetch together!
  • Find and befriend wild animals in various unique areas such as a procedurally-generated maze-like forest!



  • Cultivate strong connections with your companions through mini-games like fetch, and by showering them with pets, snacks, and toys!
  • Optionally assist animals in finding their ideal home by facilitating an adoption matching process with the townsfolk. You'll still be able to see them around town and check on their well-being
  • Animals will display family bonds and distinct individual personalities. As players invest more quality time caring for their furry friends, they'll gain abilities to enhance their understanding of them, fostering deeper connections and interactions





Llama Town boasts a diverse population for you to meet! From the aspiring designer to the chill gamer, resilient immigrant, and determined engineer, encounter individuals with unique personalities and intriguing stories. Forge new friendships and perhaps discover romance. Challenge your friends to activities like jump rope, town cleaning, trivia games, spelling bees, and more -- there's never a dull moment in Llama Town!

Other features 🥰


  • Start your own family and guide your children as they grow, go to school, and make their own friends, with the loving support of nearby grandparents
  • By fueling the town's fundraising efforts, witness the unveiling of new infrastructure and breathtaking locales -- think vacation islands, lush forests, bustling cities, and picturesque beaches!
  • Unleash your creativity and personalize your dwelling and surrounding land. Fill them with decor to make your one-of-a-kind dream home

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB graphics memory
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB graphics memory
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a delightful journey of breeding and raising adorable animals like llamas, bunnies, and capybaras while building meaningful relationships with the residents of Llama Town. What unique animal breeds will you discover and whom among the townsfolk will you befriend? Adventure awaits!
